name: A way out (itch) (Keb1t)
description:
A way outThe game:

You are an entity in a dream, every night. Your dream will turn out in a bad dream and your goal is to achieve the exit.

The concept:

If you don't know the way, don't worry. You will repeat the dream to find a way out.
Remember: There always is a way out from a bad dream.

The controls:

Use ARROWS keys to move the soul.

The developer:

My name is Kevin and I'm a solo developer.

I also made adver games for companies.
My socials: INSTAGRAM
